original_text: As they made this promise to the Lord, they shouted loudly to show that they agreed. They also made a loud noise with trumpets and sheep's horns.
korean_text: 무리가 큰 소리로 외치며 피리와 나팔을 불어 여호와께 맹세하매

sentences.original_text: As they made this promise to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 주님께 이 약속을 할 때

sentences.original_text: They also made a loud noise
